title: Smart Data Models - Ucifi / LED color light
description: The uCIFI LED color light enables to control light colors of a LED luminaire.. objectID:'3420'. objectURN:'urn:oma:lwm2m:ext:3420'. lwm2mVersion:'1.0'. objectVersion:'1.0'. multipleInstances:'Multiple'. mandatory:'Optional'.

type.description: Property. It must be equal to `LED color light`.

RGB value.description: Property. Text string according to the RBG hexadecimal format with # (e.g. #FF0000 for 100% red).. resourceID:'1'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Mandatory'.
